TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content: Due to a very slow internet, I can't upload updates to the spaceport. I still working to make release as soon as everything is solve.

The Ariane 4 is out now:

Download LH_ESApack_v0.4

Edited July 28, 2013 by Yogui87

Bravo! C'est manifique

I do have a niggle though. On the Ariane 5 the second stage (that tiny little thing with little spherical tanks) has about 4000 or more m/s Delta-V when it's attached to ATV, according to MechJeb. Now, the calculation might be a little off or it might be that you made a mistake entering the fuel quantity??
DID you pull the zoom ability from the Zeus Space Telescope

The Ariane 4 is AMAZING!

hi, you changed the textures to another format then .png?

How long before pandora is updated

Bravo! C'est manifique

I do have a niggle though. On the Ariane 5 the second stage (that tiny little thing with little spherical tanks) has about 4000 or more m/s Delta-V when it's attached to ATV, according to MechJeb. Now, the calculation might be a little off or it might be that you made a mistake entering the fuel quantity??

I didn't change anything in fuel quantity since the last update so I might be a MechJeb bug or an error from previous update.

DID you pull the zoom ability from the Zeus Space Telescope

I didn't change anything. Do you think I need to increase the range of the zoom?

The Ariane 4 is AMAZING!

I have a question though. Do you ever plan to make the the ESC (Ãƒâ€°tage SupÃƒÂ©rieur Cryotechnique) for the Ariane 5? It would make different variants of the Ariane 5 accessible.

Here's a pic of the ESC:

Right now, I don't plained it. I don't think we need the ESC.

How long would It take to port the rovers which use CleverBobcat over to stock rover wheel modules? 2-3 weeks? A month or two?

Long, because I can't make stock wheels at the moment. I need to find more information or tuto to make them work.

hi, you changed the textures to another format then .png?

Textures have been change for .tga format.

How long before pandora is updated

Pandora is updated, just need to upload it, when my internet will be faster (still have issues, damned connexion) and Spaceport will not stop my upload.

its not that you need to increas it. i didn't see the option to add zoom to an action group.....also I'm having issues with the DSL. it says im missing all the arm parts....also

Yogui Thanks for all you do i really love you work Thank you so much

Edited July 29, 2013 by Big_Ron

its not that you need to increas it. i didn't see the option to add zoom to an action group.....also I'm having issues with the DSL. it says im missing all the arm parts....also

Yogui Thanks for all you do i really love you work Thank you so much

Just go to Action groups settings, select the telescope and choose "Zoom in" or "Zoom out" animation:

If you uses the Zeus telescope.craft file, Action group button 4 zooms in and 5 zooms out.

About DSL, you have an issue with MuMechLib plugin. Try to install it again correctly.

Yogui87, any chance you might make a bigger version or versions of the Prometheus lander with balloons? I find it an awesome way to land rovers and the like but you have now created an itch i want to scratch and build my own rovers that land in such nacelles. Or Maybe a part which would allow me to attach deploy able balloons to the craft, i know another Mod had this back in .20 but it borked the game.

Yogui87, any chance you might make a bigger version or versions of the Prometheus lander with balloons? I find it an awesome way to land rovers and the like but you have now created an itch i want to scratch and build my own rovers that land in such nacelles. Precisely
Yogui you gonna love this one. i forgot to install the MuMechLib plugin. as soon as i put in from the plugin folder it fixed the issue with teh scope and the DSL....dam i feel dum

Please make one for the Mercury Messenger probe!

EDIT: Happy 100th Page!
Oh gods of lionhead aerospace hear our pleas, "More Balloons!" Lol

Yes, thanks to Lionhead community to reach 100 pages milestone:

About airbags: Making a larger nacelle is easily doable I think, just need a few modification. I could have a look to make airbags that could be attached anywhere, it may be a little harder to make something work properly but I could try.

Could you make a proper spacecraft for the Prometheus Solar Rover? I posted a schematic of the Spirit rover capsule a page or two ago, that would be perfect. Also, what's with "Mk1 and Mk2 capsules" mentioned in it's description in the OP?
I was wondering if you were planning on updating the Prometheus rover if it is not already been done so.

Please make one for the Mercury Messenger probe!

EDIT: Happy 100th Page!

I'm planing a satellite/probe parts pack.

Could you make a proper spacecraft for the Prometheus Solar Rover? I posted a schematic of the Spirit rover capsule a page or two ago, that would be perfect. Also, what's with "Mk1 and Mk2 capsules" mentioned in it's description in the OP?

I think I could make a capsule with a transfer stage like the Pandora's one. About Mk1 and Mk2 capsules, they have been removed when I choose to use airbags for landing. They were part of an old skycrane system.

I was wondering if you were planning on updating the Prometheus rover if it is not already been done so.

Prometheus rover already have been updated.

Thor's lander will be updated a little later because I'm working to update this mod with a transfer stage and few tweaks.

I'm planing a satellite/probe parts pack.

Yay! All hail the KING OF THE PROBES!

Venera by any chance? Cassini/Huygens? Galileo?
